name: Luna Sky
description: Momentum-driven old school platformer with modern graphics & physics with a focus on exploration. Offers precision and on later levels a lot of speed. Each world brings new abilities & gameplay. As Luna wakes up, she has no idea where she is, and is alone except... Help her discover this strange world!
minimum_requirements: Минимальные: ОС: 64-bit Windows Vista or better Процессор: Quad Core i3 Оперативная память: 4 GB ОЗУ Видеокарта: OpenGL 3.0 compatible graphics card, Intel HD 4000 or better Место на диске: 3 GB
recommended_requirements: Рекомендованные: ОС: 64-bit Windows Vista or better Процессор: Quad Core i5 or better Оперативная память: 8 GB ОЗУ Видеокарта: Discrete compatible graphics card (AMD or nVidia) capable of OpenGL 3.0 Место на диске: 3 GB

reviews.review_text: A decent game with old school graphics. Brought back some memories from Sonic and MDK graphics.
